内容简介

[

　　contains the authors research results on energy—efficient routing technologies in wireless sensor network， and its main content includes the following： clustering heterogeneous network routing algorithm based on mixed integer programming； adaptive aggregation routing and data fusion algorithms in wireless sensor networks； the lowest energy consumption routing algorithm，'the energy balancing and lowest energy—con— sumption routing algorithm， and the lcast delay and low energy—consumption routing algOfithm on the basis of dynamic programming method.
